description: Ash and his friends encountered an angry Ursaring while they were lost in a forest and it got mad and which started chasing them. While being chased by the Ursaring, Paul appeared and attacked the wild Ursaring with his Chimchar. Paul`s Chimchar weakened it enough to capture it and Paul decided to keep it after scanning its strength with his Pok√©dex.
name: Ringuma (Shinji)
